content.rendered:
Directed by Parasuram

Written by Parasuram

Cast Mahesh Babu (Mahesh / Mahi). Keerthy Suresh (Kalavathi). Mahesh Manjrekar (Finance Minister). Samuthirakani (Rajendranath). Vennela Kishore (Kishore). Nadia Moidu (Rajakumari). Duy Beck (American Boss). Tanikella Bharani (Master). Ajay (ACP). Krishna Murali Posani (Colony President). Rajshri Nair (Rajendranath’s wife). Ilez Badurgov (Bodyguard). Brahmaji (Bank Employee). Ravi Prakash (Krishna Murthy). Nikita Rozenko (Biker gang leader). Krishna Bhatt. Pavitra Lokesh (Mahi’s mother). Parag Tyagi (Bihari). Subbaraju (Rajendranath’s brother-in-law).Rajsekhar Aningi. Ananth (Colony member). Darbha Appaji Ambarisha (Colony member). Satyam Rajesh (Rajesh). Geetha Bhascker (Master’s wife). Nagendra Babu (Mahi’s father). Abed Sarker (Abed). Meka Rama Krishna ((as Ramakrishna Meka)). Temper Vamsi. Rajiv Kumar Aneja (Businessman (as Rajiv Kumar A.)). Prabhas Sreenu (Recovery agent). Sanjay Swaroop. Amit Shivdas Nair (Sheenu). Sowmya Menon (Sowmya). Gowtham Raju. Bhel Prasad. Kotesh Manava. Jaya Naidu. Master Darshan. Subhash. Ravikanth. Nuris Blu (Kiss girl (uncredited))

Language Telugu

Producers Gopichand Achanta. Ram Achanta. Faisal Amin. Chiranjeevi Pedamallu. E.V. Rajkumar. Chandrashekhar Ravipati. Y. Ravi Shankar. K.V.V. Bala Subramanyam. Anil Yerneni. Naveen Yerneni

Production 14 Reels Plus. G. Mahesh Babu Entertainment. Mythri Movie Makers
